查看最新特性，检查并更新扩展: View the latest features, check and update the extension
作者：KAKAA，青空莉想做舞台少女的狗: Author: KAKAA, 青空莉想做舞台少女的狗
本扩展免费使用，禁止任何形式的商业用途: This extension is free to use but prohibited for any commercial use
脚本可能存在风险，请确保安全后再运行: The script may exist risks, please ensure safety before running
下载提供给 VSCode/Cursor 的 TypeScript 类型声明文件,: Download TypeScript type declaration file for VSCode/Cursor, which can provide code hints and can be sent to ai to understand
手机或 AI 官网用: Use for mobile or AI official website
下载你所用酒馆版本及扩展所提供的酒馆 STScript 命令列表, 可发给 ai: Download the list of Tavern STScript commands provided by the version of the tavern you are using and the extension, which can be sent to ai for reference
启用后，符合条件的代码块将被渲染: When enabled, qualified code blocks will be rendered
折叠所有代码块，避免正则替换成前端代码时影响阅读: Fold all code blocks to avoid affecting reading when regex replaces frontend code
在前端内字体、图片等资源未加载完成前，显示加载动画而不是显示不完全界面: Show loading animation instead of incomplete interface before fonts, images and other resources in frontend are loaded
使用 Blob URL 渲染前端界面，可能存在样式问题且某些国产浏览器不可用，但: Use Blob URL to render frontend interface, may have style issues and not available on some browsers, but easier for F12 developer tool debugging
设置需要渲染的楼层数，从最新楼层开始计数。为0时，将渲染所有楼层: Set the number of floors to render, counting from the latest floor. When 0, all floors will be rendered
查看当前提示词发送情况，窗口开启时会监听新的发送及时更新显示: View the current prompt sending situation, the window will listen for new sending and update the display in time
查看和管理全局、角色、聊天、消息楼层变量: View and manage global, role, chat, message variables
